text: pasugiya wasare nowambar masa dumriyak niyamitha welawata wada thathpara wissakata pera pitath wu nisa adala samagama magingen samawa ayada sitiyeya.
asad sali mahatha sama wasarakama mage charithaya ghathanaya kala.
rawi jayawardhana honda daruwange piyeki.
(ingrisiyen krayiyajaniks) yanu itha adu ushnathwayan nipadawima ha eewaye bhawithaya pilibanda adhyayanayata wen wu bhauthika widyawa ha injineru widyawahi shakhawanya.
wathman palakayin me siyallenma athishayinma asarthaka bawak penwayi.
masa kipayakata udadi asela shri lankawata aawe siyalu salasum kriyathmaka karana aramuna athiwaya.
me siyalla kala haki wanne maya bandhana hi santa sitina sarwa baladhari orakal wani me janadhipathi santa siya sarwabaladharii siya piya sitina nisada?

adhyapanaya - 26 kalapaya, mahacharya dharmasena arampanna samaru kalapaya (1996 janawari), sanskaraka mahacharya es.rupasinha, “margopadeshaya upadeshanaya ha mano prathikaraya” - di.es ranawaka (79-92) shri lanka jathika adhyapana sangamaya, adhyapana pitaya, kolambaa wi.wi.
ese illana shashyayanta polisiya yoda mese pahara dima kethek durata sadharanikaranaya kala haki da?

ee haraha rajaye sewakayanta rupiyal 2500 ka awamayakata yatathwa mema wasare ayawayen watup wadi wimak laba dennemi.

boh boh boh gala baten dunguli dekathunak pitakarala mola stat wenawa...eeta passe thamayi wi ketena thana thiyena loku katata wi tika dala kotanna ganne...ketena kotama haluth ekka kalawan wela ena dahayiya tika hulange yanna pan ekakuth rodetama allala atola thiyenne...
eyata wenas prathicharada thibiya hakiyi.
“mahaneni, dan monayam kathawakin yukthawa sitiyahuda?
ema mudala ruwanwali maha sa kapruk pujawata wen kala.
ane hari lassanayi.
paraddala dapu oluwa ussanna bariwa wattala thiyena kandayamakata gahanna yanne durwala minisun.
nithiyata thahanam deya wiya yuththe, aagamika adhyapanaya labima sandaha pansalata bhara dena kuda daruwanta athawara kirima.
eeth kathawa gana sathutuyi.
eeye wenakanma blog wala kament dada hitapu oba mama hadisiyema giya kiyala hithanne kohomada?
mu mokada kare, kunuharupa kiyala eekita banapu eka!”
mata ganak thibbe na.
ayidiyas gana ma kothanaka ho obata pawasa athath, mata eya pilipadinnata nohaki wima nisa masayak pamana kalayak blog satahanak noliya sitinnata mata haki ...

mahinda rajapaksha 2009 mayi dahanamawanada nandikangal kalapuwedi, ingrisin pramukha batahirayan hadawanga athi dangikala ha lankawe kapa suddo awuradu thihakatath wanga wangikalayak rakabala gaththa thrasthawadaya mulinuputa ratata athkarala dunna jayagrahanaya thamayi 1803 sita awuradu 209 kata passe sinhala api labapu prathama jayagrahanaya.

thaman awurudu thuna hatharak ehemath nathnam eeta wadi kalayak aadare karala denna kasada bandina mohotha lassanata ganna mona kellath hina dakinawa.
rata hatiyata gathahoth eeta ayath wanne sinhala, bauddha, gowigama, menma yam aakarayaka nila balayak ho samaja balayak darana, ෙjyashta pirimin ya.

kompanynyawidiye bimata samathala kerunu gewal pawathi rajapaksha aanduwa yatathe, kolambaa nagaraya sanwardhanaya namin da, wathman aanduwa yatathe kolambaa ha basnahira sanwardhanaya kirima namin da kriyathmaka wanne kolambaa ha eeawata pawathina wanijamaya washayen itha watina idamwalin dashaka gananawak padinchiwa siti kamkaru ha dugi pawul iwathkara ayojakayanta labha godagasa ganima udesa ema idam pawara dimataya.

mema pilipinaye duma guwethi hi wesena minisada ewani pudgalayeki.antharjala sangam pudumayata path karana me ath deka ahimi minisage apuru nirmana denis namathi filipina chayarupakaru wisin chayarupa gatha kara atha.mema chayarupa siyalla kar pilibanda wishesha kamaththak dakwana prasiddha web adawiyaka pala kara atha.meya ketharam sukshama nimawumak athi athkamda yanna obata meya narambaimen awabodha we.meya narambaana oba nisakawama meya yamkisi yanthrayakin ho itha palapurudu daksha ath dekakin nimawu bawa sithana namuth eya ese nowana bawa sathyaya.singith trayisikala anu ru nipadawana mohu ath nomathiwa karana sapankama nam sabawinma wismithaya.mohu ilektronika sewa sapayana thanakin mema trayisikal nipadawana ayuru pilibanda igena athi bawa denis pawasayi.mewa thama athla matha thabiya haki tharam kuda hurubuhuti anu ruya.mema kuda anuru dolar 10k wana athara wishala anuru dolar 40k pamana wana athara ema mila itha sadharanaya.
